issue.subject: Backend orders list small bugs
issue.description:
* The list counts the products, not the order. With orders containing more than one product, pagination is wrong
* There's no link to user account
* Status labels may use the wrong color
* Provider list SQL is wrong
* SQL queries performance problems (wrong joins, unused tables, distincts...)
